sentences.sentence: It feels strange to speak anthropomorphically about bits and bytes.
sentences.translation: 因为用拟人的手法来谈论比特和字节往往令人觉得很怪异。

sentences.sentence: The advantage of an anthropomorphically shaped being was that it could be a truly general-purpose robot, able to utilize human tools;
sentences.translation: 这么做的好处是它可以是一个真正一般用途的机器人，能够使用人类工具；
